casebody.data:
99-0489 (La. 4/1/99)

SALZER PLUMBING COMPANY, INC., and Saul Silverman d/b/a Silverman Plumbing Company v. PROFESSIONAL REMODELERS, INC., Charles J. Folse, and Carrie and Robert Sonnemaker. No. 99-CC-0489. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Salzer Plumbing Co. Inc.; Sil-verman, Saul d/b/a; Silverman Plumbing Company; — Plaintiff(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Supervisory and/or Remedial; Parish of Jefferson First Parish Court Div. “A” Number 92636; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, Number 98-C-1219

Denied.

VICTORY, J. would grant the writ. TRAYLOR, J. not on panel.
